name: Cindy Cantelli

topics.response_text: This is A Quick Fix. I mean that's the name of our shop. Paulie and mine that is. My name is Cindy. Cindy Cantelli.

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Rivet City's history?
topics.response_text: Well, I don't really know, to tell the truth. How does any city get started, really?

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Ted Strayer?
topics.response_text: Have you tried the common room?  That's where he sleeps.

topics.topic_text: Whoa! Slow down, lady. You're freaking me out.
topics.response_text: Sorry. I get nervous easily. When I'm nervous, I'm fast. I mean, I talk. Fast that is. See, I'm doing it again.{Say it all fast and nervous.}

topics.topic_text: I like you. You're funny. I assume you sell Chems?
topics.response_text: Yeah. Paulie and I. Our shop is in the market.
Oh. Okay. Well let me know if you want anything. To buy that is.

topics.topic_text: Damn! You sound like you've been sampling your own stuff.
topics.response_text: No, no, no! I would never do that.

topics.topic_text: I heard Angela Staley has a crush on Diego.
topics.response_text: The poor dear. I wish there was something I could do to help her.

topics.topic_text: Where can I get a stiff drink?
topics.response_text: The Muddy Rudder. Belle waters down the liquor, but it's cheap. It's on the lower deck.

topics.topic: RCTopicPaulieAddictDid you know that Paulie Cantelli is an addict?
topics.topic_text: So your husband is an addict?
topics.response_text: He's hopeless. I have to keep him away from the shop or he'll rob us blind.

topics.topic_text: When are Angela and Diego getting married?
topics.response_text: At 3 o'clock tomorrow. Everyone in Rivet City is invited. I'm sure that includes you.

topics.topic: RivetCityBarterI'm here to do business with you.
topics.topic_text: What do you have for sale?
topics.response_text: We've got all kinds of chems.

conversation.topic_text: It's time for me to leave, Cindy.
conversation.response_text: I'm sure you'll be back soon.
Hey, Vera. Still dodging old Seagrave? He's got eyes for you.
I've got nothing like that here. Why don't you go have a drink in the Muddy Rudder? That should do it.
Yes, I got the invitation. I wouldn't miss you and Diego's wedding for anything.{Say the first sentence with a laugh.}
I hope Paulie hasn't injected all our inventory.{muttered to herself}
Don't know where he is, and I'm not sure I care. I saw you talking to Bannon the other day. Did he mention me?

description:
Cindy Cantelli is a 37 year-old African American Female.

Cindy Cantelli is the owner of A Quick Fix, a chem dispensary in Rivet City's market. Despite her awareness of the dangers of addiction, she has no problem selling chems with no medical benefit. She's developed a crush on her neighbor Bannon while harboring a particular disdain for the upper-class residents Henry and Christie Young.

Cindy Cantelli's Personality: Nervous and talkative when meeting new people, Cindy is morally ambiguous when it comes to selling chems. She's attracted to Bannon despite his egotistical nature but openly expresses her contempt for those she perceives as pompous or morally superior, particularly Henry and Christie Young.

Cindy Cantelli's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Cindy Cantelli grew up in the post-apocalyptic world. She married Paulie, and together they established A Quick Fix in Rivet City's market, becoming known for their good stock of chems. Over the years, Cindy has developed a crush on Bannon, her neighbor in the market, despite his egotistical personality. She has a particular disdain for the upper deck residents, especially Henry and Christie Young, whose happy marriage and perceived moral superiority irritate her. While aware of the evils of addiction, Cindy has no qualms about selling chems with no medical benefit, and she doesn't object when her husband tries to persuade others to take dangerous chemicals like Psycho.
